data.name: plAuction_Property.Help
data.value: Choose "Auction Listings Types"

data.name: ControlTitle_admin_setupwizard.Text
data.value: Classified Pro - Setup Wizard

data.name: lblFinish.Text
data.value: View summary below, and click "Finish" button to save data

data.name: wsAd.Text
data.value: Classified Ads

data.name: lblGeneralTips.Text
data.value:
Classified Pro is an enterprise-class DNN module which helps you to create an online store (publish fixed price listings), auction website (publish auction listings), and publish classified ads as easy as ABC. It includes 16 sub modules and 1 skin object. This wizard will guide you to create necessary data (departments and categories), add some pages and put related sub modules on them, this will save your time. However, if you are familiar with Classified Pro, you can cancel this wizard and configure module by yourself.

    Would you like to configure Classified Pro in this wizard?

data.name: li_SetupType_Yes.Text
data.value: Yes, configure Classified Pro in this wizard (Recommend for new users)

data.name: lblFixedPriceTip.Text
data.value:
Fixed price listings can be created for large quantities of identical items and buyers can select the number of items that they would like to purchase. By choose "Yes, I want to publish fixed price listings" option below, you can create an online store with Classified Pro.

    Would you like to publish fixed price listings?

data.name: wsFixedPrice.Text
data.value: Fixed Price Listings

data.name: lblAd.Text
data.value: Classified Ads

data.name: li_Ad_No.Text
data.value: No, I don't need to publish classified ads

data.name: lblGeneral.Text
data.value: Classified Pro Setup Wizard

data.name: cbAuction_Property_Other.Text
data.value: 3 Others - Check on this option if you want to auction other services or virtual items. For example, software development outsourcing, online game account.

data.name: wsGeneral.Text
data.value: General

data.name: plAuction_Property.Text
data.value: Auction Listing Types

data.name: li_FixedPrice_Yes.Text
data.value: Yes, I want to publish fixed price listings

data.name: plFixedPrice_Property.Text
data.value: Fixed Price Listing Types

data.name: lblAdTip.Text
data.value:
Best for advertising goods or promoting services, or posting news articles / photos / videos / audio / documents / jobs / real estate / cars...etc, Classified Ads promote communication between interested parties; but no transactions (bidding, buying, or payments) are managed through the website. Unlike traditional classified ads, online classified ads benefit from the addition of images, videos, audio, documents, and internal messages (comments, ratings, help tickets, etc).

    Would you like to publish classified ads?

data.name: li_Ad_Yes.Text
data.value: Yes, I want to publish classified ads

data.name: li_SetupType_No.Text
data.value: No, I am familiar with Classified Pro, I will configure it by myself. (You can click the "Run Classified Pro Setup Wizard" link later).

data.name: wsAuction.Text
data.value: Auction Listings

data.name: lblAuction.Text
data.value: Auction Listings

data.name: lblAuctionTip.Text
data.value:
The standard auction is used to sell goods or services to the highest bidder. Sellers can also elect to set a "reserve" price, which will guarantee that their item will not be sold unless this minimum requested price is met, and a "buy now" price which allows buyers to bypass bidding altogether and purchase the item outright. By choose "Yes, I want to publish auction listings" option below, you can create an auction website with Classified Pro.

    Would you like to publish auction listings?

data.name: li_Auction_Yes.Text
data.value: Yes, I want to publish auction listings

data.name: cbAuction_Property_Goods.Text
data.value: 0 Physicl Goods - when client win an auction and paid, delivery him with specific physical goods. Check on this item if you want to auction normal products online.

data.name: cbAuction_Property_Software.Text
data.value: 1 Software/Digital Files - when client win an auction and paid, give him rights to download specific files. Check on this item if you want to auction software / digital files / videos /audio, etc.

data.name: lblFixedPrice_Property.Text
data.value: Classified Pro allows you to publish 4 types of "Fixed Price Listings": Physical Goods, Software/Digital Files, Portal Roles, Others. <font color="red">Uncheck below options</font> if you don't want to publish related listings. For example, if you don't want to sell portal roles in this site, then you need to uncheck the "2 Portal Role" option.

data.name: li_FixedPrice_No.Text
data.value: No, I don't need to publish fixed price listings

data.name: cbFixedPrice_Property_Goods.Text
data.value: 0 Physical Goods - after paid, delivery client with specific physical goods. Check on this item if you want to sell normal products online.

data.name: plFixedPrice_Property.Help
data.value: Choose "Fixed Price Listing Types"

data.name: cbFixedPrice_Property_Role.Text
data.value: 2 Portal Roles - after paid, add client to a specific role. Check on this item if you want charge money based site roles. You can also offer download files for this role, and client can access these files before his/her role is expired.

data.name: hlReturn.Text
data.value: Return

data.name: cbFixedPrice_Property_Other.Text
data.value: 3 Others - Other services which don't handle on this site. For example, if you sell virtual items (like online game account).

data.name: lblSuccess.Text
data.value: Congratulation! Now you can click "Access Cp_Admin sub module" link below to add listings. Or you can click "Return" link to return to previous page if you want to add listings later.

data.name: li_Auction_No.Text
data.value: No, I don't need to publish auction listings

data.name: lblAuction_Property.Text
data.value: Classified Pro allows you to publish 3 types of "Auction Listings": Physical Goods, Software/Digital Files, Others. <font color="red">Uncheck below options</font> if you don't want to publish related listings. For example, if you don't want to auction software/digital files in this site, then you need to uncheck the "1 Software/Digital Files" option. Note, unlike "Fixed Price Listings", Classified Pro doesn't support auction portal roles, because in theory, the quantity of users which can be added into a portal role is unlimited, so it is meaningless to auction portal roles.

data.name: lblFixedPrice.Text
data.value: Fixed Price Listings

data.name: cbFixedPrice_Property_Software.Text
data.value: 1 Software/Digital Files - after paid, give client rights to download related files. Check on this item if you want to sell software / digital files / videos /audio, etc.

data.name: hlAccessAdmin.Text
data.value: Access Cp_Admin sub module

data.name: lblSummary.Text
data.value:
Thanks for using this wizard, Classified Pro will do below works after you click "Finish" button:

    (1). Create a "Classified Pro" page.

    (2). Create a "Store Admin" sub page, and add "Cp_Admin" sub module on it. "Cp_Admin" sub module is used to manage all data in Classified Pro. In most cases, you only need 1 instance of "Cp_Admin" sub module per portal. Note, if you already put "Cp_Admin" sub module on another page, then this step will be bypassed.

    (3). Create a few departments according to your selection in this wizard, departments are top-level unit to organize data. For example, if you check "Yes, I want to publish fixed price listings" and check on "0 Physical Goods" and "1 Software/Digital Files" under "Fixed Price Listing Types", Classified Pro will create 2 departments ("Fixed Price - Physical Goods" and "Fixed Price - Software"). If you also check on "publish auction listings" and "publish classified ads", Classified Pro will also create other related departments.

    (4). For each department, create a list page and put "Cp_Product_List" sub module on it to show related products. For example, create a "Software List" page and put "Cp_Product_List" sub module on it to show software listings.

    (5). For each department, create a detail page and put "Cp_Product_Detail" sub module on it to show related product detail. For example, create a "Software Detail" page and put "Cp_Product_Detail" sub module on it to show software detail.

    (6). Note, you still need to configure other options (like payment gateway, location, shipping methods...etc) at "Cp_Admin sub module" after close this wizard.

    (7). If DNN built-in "Content Localization" feature is enabled (which allows you to publish multiple languages content in same site), Classified Pro will do above works for each language, to allow you to publish products (listings) with multiple languages. For example, if you have 2 languages (English and Chinese) installed, Classified Pro will generate 2 "Store Admin" pages (one for English, the other for Chinese) and put 2 Cp_Admin sub instances to them, it will also create 2 copies to list page (Cp_Product_List sub module) and detail page (Cp_Product_Detail sub module) too.

data.name: error_NoFeature.Text
data.value: Please select at least one feature that Classified Pro can do for you (publish fixed price listings, publish auction listings, or publish classified ads).

data.name: lblPayPal.Text
data.value: PayPal Payment Gateway

data.name: plEnablePaypal.Help
data.value: Enable PayPal payment gateway

data.name: plEnablePaypal.Text
data.value: Enable PayPal

data.name: plPayPalId.Help
data.value: Enter your PayPal account (like xiaoqi98@msn.com)

data.name: plPayPalId.Text
data.value: PayPal Account

data.name: Tip_PayPal.Text
data.value:
Classified Pro supports 6 online payment gateways (PayPal, Authorize.Net, Stripe, Google Checkout, China Alipay, DineroMail) and 1 offline payment gateway (Manual Checkout). PayPal is the most frequently-used payment gateway because it is easy to register, and doesn't require secure connection (https:). Here you can check on "Enable PayPal" and enter your PayPal account (email address like xiaoqi98@msn.com) to receive money via PayPal.

    Note, you can configure other payment gateways later (by click "Cp_Admin sub module - Admin Control Panel - Configurations - Store Settings").

data.name: wsPayPal.Text
data.value: PayPal Payment Gateway
